full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 87 of 261 1248
LC6Cmax3 Kate - cross
1 A. Yes.
2 Q. And you appeared on television with other women who had been present during that public court appearance; correct?
3
4 A. Yes.
5 Q. And there were about six of you who were featured on a television show; correct?
6
7 A. Yes.
8 Q. Talking about your allegations against Jeffrey Epstein; correct?
9
10 A. Yes.
11 Q. And you all appeared as a sisterhood of accusers against Jeffrey Epstein?
12
13 A. Sorry, is it a question?
14 Q. Yes.
15 A. Did we appear as a sisterhood?
16 Q. Yes.
17 A. I don't know how it came across to other people.
18 Q. Well, you were somewhat affectionate to one another on the show, weren't you?
19
20 A. I suppose so.
21 Q. You were supportive of one another on the show; correct?
22 A. Yeah. I had just met them, so --
23 Q. Well, you had met them for the very first time that day?
24 A. I think it may have been at the court appearance which may have been the day before.
25
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00012838
